title: Overstock
name: overstock
short_description: Adds storage crates, a block which stores large quantities of a single item
long_description:
This mod adds **storage crates**, a container which holds up to 64 stacks of a single item. There's no inventory grid; right-click to put stacks in, and punch to take stacks out.

- Right-click to add a stack.
- Double right-click to add all the items in your inventory of that type.
- Punch to take a stack.
- Sneak-punch to take a single item.
